Bitcoin dominance is slipping, and altcoins—including meme coins—are outperforming. The Fear and Greed Index is deep in “Greed” territory, and institutional interest is shifting toward alternatives like Ethereum and Solana. Is Pudgy Penguins still a strong investment? Despite its recent 8.4% dip, Pudgy Penguins has soared over 217% in the past month. It remains a top contender in the meme coin space, particularly if it holds community momentum.

title: Tron Forecast for 2025: TRX Expected to Hit $1 as Ozak AI Gains Momentum With AI-Backed Utility and Massive ROI Potential
body: Crypto markets shift into a new bullish phase, Tron (TRX) is back on the radar of investors seeking strong upside potential heading into 2025. Known for its high-speed blockchain performance and robust dApp ecosystem, Tron continues to expand its reach in DeFi and digital entertainment. Simultaneously, the emergence of Ozak AI —an artificial intelligence-powered blockchain project currently in presale—has stirred excitement with its bold vision and the possibility of delivering up to 200x returns from its current $0.005 price point. With both TRX and Ozak AI making headlines, investors are weighing two different styles of growth: one backed by years of development, the other by disruptive AI-powered innovation. Tron’s 2025 Outlook: Riding the Ascending Channel to $1 Tron’s price action currently reflects a bullish ascending channel, a technical pattern that typically signals a continuation of upward momentum. This pattern shows higher lows and higher highs, indicating sustained buying interest even during broader market consolidations. As TRX trades around $0.11, its price action remains comfortably inside this ascending formation, supported by positive sentiment across altcoins. Within this technical setup, key resistance levels for Tron stand at $0.15, where recent rally attempts have paused, $0.21, which was a multi-month ceiling during the 2021 bull run, and finally $0.30, a major macro resistance that, if broken, could open the path toward the $1 milestone by 2025. On the downside, TRX enjoys firm support at $0.095, the base of the ascending channel. Below that, $0.082 offers technical strength based on Q2 price action, and $0.065 is a historical demand zone that previously sparked strong reversals. As long as TRX maintains the channel and macro trends remain favorable, analysts believe a gradual climb toward $1 is not only plausible but increasingly probable. Tron’s active role in stablecoin transfers, USDT dominance on its chain, and the growing volume in its DeFi ecosystem are all key factors supporting this forecast. However, for TRX to rally past its previous all-time highs, continued adoption and innovation will be required to outpace competing Layer-1s. Ozak AI: Early Entry, Explosive Upside While Tron is building steadily on its existing ecosystem, Ozak AI is capturing attention with its potential to disrupt multiple sectors using artificial intelligence and decentralized computing. Currently in Stage 4 of Ozak AI presale , Ozak AI is available at just $0.005 and has already raised over $1.3 million. The project’s appeal lies in its promise to integrate AI Forecast Agents, a decentralized prediction system that leverages real-world data, machine learning, and blockchain immutability. Unlike traditional AI projects, Ozak AI introduces DePIN (Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks) to bring tangible utility into the token economy. By turning user data into fuel for AI models, and rewarding participation through the native OZ token, the platform merges AI with crypto-native incentives—a space few have entered with clarity or scale. If Ozak AI delivers on its roadmap and achieves a listing near or beyond its projected $1 post-launch target, early investors could see 200x returns—transforming a $100 stake into $20,000. With AI dominating global headlines and investor interest growing in predictive intelligence tools, Ozak AI’s model is especially compelling for those looking to ride the next wave of innovation. TRX vs Ozak AI Tron offers a relatively low-volatility investment compared to newer altcoins, ideal for those preferring an established blockchain with clear use cases. Ozak AI, on the other hand, presents an asymmetric opportunity—higher risk, but potentially far greater returns. TRX may provide solid 5x–8x growth if it hits the $1 level, but OZ could deliver 100x–200x if it reaches its $1 target from the presale entry of $0.005. For investors diversifying across crypto sectors, both projects serve different roles. Tron anchors portfolios with infrastructure-based fundamentals, while Ozak AI represents the bleeding edge of AI-crypto convergence. With Tron’s ascending channel providing a bullish backdrop and a target of $1 in 2025, TRX remains a solid Layer-1 option for long-term crypto holders. However, the explosive narrative and low entry price of Ozak AI could make it one of the standout performers of the next market cycle. Whether you prioritize stability or exponential upside, both TRX and OZ offer valuable positions in a diversified crypto strategy heading into 2025. About Ozak AI Ozak AI is a blockchain-based crypto task that provides an innovative platform that focuses on predictive AI and advanced data analytics for financial markets. Through machine learning algorithms and decentralized community technologies, Ozak AI enables real-time, accurate, and actionable insights to help crypto lovers and corporations make the perfect choices. For more, visit: Website: https://ozak.ai/ Telegram: https://t.me/OzakAGI Twitter : https://x.com/ozakagi Disclaimer: This is a sponsored article and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Floki Inu price prediction 2025-2031: Can FLOKI surpass previous ATH?
body: Key takeaways: Floki Inu’s price prediction shows an optimistic outlook, projecting FLOKI to increase to $0.0002514 by the end of 2025. In 2028, Floki Inu is predicted to reach a maximum price of $0.000708. FLOKI price can reach a maximum level of $0.000381 and an average trading price of $0.0032 in 2031. Floki Inu is a meme coin driven by its community, the Floki Vikings. Inspired by Shiba Inu, Floki Inu aims to democratize power in the crypto space, pivoting the crypto market away from traditional financial entities. The Floki project ecosystem is diverse. It includes Valhalla, a blockchain combat game that rewards players with Floki tokens, and Floki Places, a store for merchandise and NFTs where purchases can be made using Floki tokens. Additionally, Floki University provides educational resources on the cryptocurrency market and blockchain technology. The recent launch (June 30, 2025) of the Valhalla mainnet of opBNB, coupled with DeFi partnerships like Chainlink, collectively enhances Floki Inu’s value and future potential by driving demand and expanding its use. Having attained its all-time high of $0.0003462 on June 5, 2024, can FLOKI reach $1? Overview Cryptocurrency Floki Inu Token FLOKI Price $0.0001300 Market Capitalization $1.24B Trading Volume $823.28M Circulating Supply 9.65T FLOKI All-time High $0.0003462 (Jun 05, 2024) All-time Low $0.00000002 (Aug 08, 2021) 24-hour High $0.0001392 24-hour Low $0.0001065 Floki Inu price prediction: Technical analysis Volatility (30-day Variation) 14.33% 50-Day SMA $0.00008355 14-Day RSI 77.48 Sentiment Bullish Fear & Greed Index 74 (Greed) Green Days 16/30 (53%) 200-Day SMA $0.00009675 Floki Inu price analysis Key Insights: FLOKI breaks out decisively from months-long consolidation with a 400%+ volume surge. Momentum indicators show early divergence signals while the daily structure remains bullish. FLOKI on the daily timeframe: Floki Inu sees major breakout with volume surge validation The daily timeframe for Floki Inu on July 17 shows FLOKI’s breakout from a prolonged consolidation phase that lasted several months between $0.00007500-$0.00010000. The current price of $0.00012979 represents a decisive break above the upper Bollinger Band, with the 20-day SMA at $0.00009018 acting as strong support during any pullback scenarios. FLOKIUSDT 1-day price chart by TradingView The 24-hour volume has exploded to 175.81M, representing a massive 400%+ increase from typical daily volumes of 20-40M, confirming institutional and retail FOMO driving this breakout. The Bollinger Bands are expanding rapidly, suggesting increased volatility ahead. At the same time, the clean break above previous resistance zones around $0.00010500 indicates this move has legitimate backing rather than being a mere pump-and-dump scenario. FLOKI on the 4-hour timeframe: Momentum weakens in the meantime The 4-hour chart displays a textbook breakout pattern where FLOKI consolidated for nearly a week in a tight range before exploding higher with massive volume and strong bullish momentum. FLOKI is down -2.69% after a spectacular rally that saw the token surge over 40% from its base around $0.00009500 to recent highs near $0.00013500. The Alligator indicator shows all three lines (blue, red, green) perfectly aligned in bullish formation with price trading well above all moving averages. FLOKIUSDT 4-hour price chart by TradingView However, the recent red candle formation suggests profit-taking has begun, and the MACD shows momentum is starting to diverge negatively, indicating the explosive move may be losing steam as early buyers cash out near resistance. Floki Inu technical indicators: Levels and action Daily simple moving average (SMA) Period Value Action SMA 3 $0.00008580 BUY SMA 5 $0.00009236 BUY SMA 10 $0.00009347 BUY SMA 21 $0.00008455 BUY SMA 50 $0.00008355 BUY SMA 100 $0.00008436 BUY SMA 200 $0.00009675 BUY Daily exponential moving average (EMA) Period Value Action EMA 3 $0.00008658 BUY EMA 5 $0.00008444 BUY EMA 10 $0.00008009 BUY EMA 21 $0.00007395 BUY EMA 50 $0.00007613 BUY EMA 100 $0.00009501 BUY EMA 200 $0.000119 BUY What to expect from FLOKI FLOKI shows a classic breakout from months of accumulation with explosive volume-backed price action. Near-term consolidation is likely around current levels, with upside potential toward $0.00015000-$0.00017000. Critical support sits at $0.00011000, and a break below would invalidate the bullish breakout and target $0.00009000. Is Floki Inu a good investment? FLOKI INU could be a big win or a big loss. It’s backed by a strong Floki community and consistent ecosystem developments, which can drive short-and long-term gains. But it’s risky, with price swings and unclear long-term value. Only invest if you’re comfortable with the risk. Will FLOKI reach $0.001? Expert analysis suggests that the $0.001 price point is achievable, provided utility grows and investor interest increases enough to drive FLOKI up ~9x its current market cap. Will Floki reach $0.01? FLOKI would need a $100 billion market cap to hit $0.01, over 100x its current value. Only the top six cryptos have surpassed this level, making it a major challenge without massive growth in adoption and demand. While possible, it’s unlikely in the short term. Does FLOKI have a good long-term future? According to expert analysis, FLOKI has a promising long-term future with consistent growth potential. The coin could reach up to $0.002 within the decade. After reaching an all-time high of $0.0003437 in late 2021, prices fluctuated throughout 2022, ranging from $0.0001004 to $0.0005815. title: XRP’s Open Interest Hits 6-Month High as Ripple Secures Dubai Property Tokenization Deal
body: XRP perpetual futures open interest has surged to a 6-month high of $9.68 billion as Ripple’s deal with Ctrl Alt to power Dubai’s Real Estate Tokenization Project gains steam. What Does XRP’s Skyrocketing Open Interest Mean Notional open interest (OI) in XRP perpetual futures has hit $9.68 billion, eclipsing January’s roughly $8.3 billion peak, marking the highest level in six months, according to CoinGlass data . This surge highlights explosive growth in leveraged bets, signaling strong confidence among traders. Historically, rising futures open interest usually trigger price increases, as evidenced by XRP climbing to a 6-month peak above $3.20. This is based on the fact that sustained positive funding rates suggest ”long” traders are actively financing shorts, which shows bullish leverage. On the macro scale, XRP has remained above its 100‑hour moving average and Ichimoku cloud, with significant support at $3 and upside potential to $3.4 if momentum holds with rising OI reflecting a strong inflow of leveraged long positions. Therefore, the jump to $9.68 billion in open interest doesn’t just signify speculation, it underscores profound market conviction, which paints a bullish picture for XRP with the altcoin having broken above the 20-day moving average . Ripple Seeks to Revamp Property Investment in Dubai Ripple has entered the Middle East’s digital asset space, teaming up with leading tokenization infrastructure platform Ctrl Alt to provide institutional custody for Dubai’s government-backed real estate tokenization initiative. Through this strategic partnership , Ctrl Alt will leverage Ripple’s institutional-grade custody tech to securely store tokenized real estate title deeds on the XRP Ledger (XRPL) , supporting the landmark real estate tokenization project by the Dubai Land Department (DLD). Recce Merrick, Ripple’s managing director of Middle East and Africa, deemed this development a game-changer and stated, “The Dubai Land Department’s Real Estate Tokenization Project is a perfect example of the type of forward-thinking, innovative initiative that is positioning Dubai at the heart of the global digital asset industry,” He added that this marked the Middle East’s first government-led tokenization of property title deeds on a public blockchain with DLD’s choice of the XRP Ledger highlighting its strength for real-world financial applications. On his part, Matt Ong, CEO and Founder, Ctrl Alt, pointed out, “As the designated tokenization provider for the DLD Project, Ctrl Alt brings deep expertise in financial engineering and digital asset infrastructure, so it makes sense for us to partner with Ripple to use their custody technology to support this initiative.” The Ctrl Alt CEO opined that partnering with Ripple gives them access to trusted, enterprise-grade technology that meets top security and performance standards with the primary objective being opening up Dubai real estate investment to a global audience. Therefore, the DLD’s Real Estate Tokenization Project is a major leap for asset tokenization and property investment in Dubai, driving greater transparency, efficiency, and accessibility. By tokenizing title deeds on the blockchain, it enables fractional ownership, allowing multiple investors to co-own property and unlocking broader market participation. Conclusion The DLD’s choice of the Ripple’s XRP Ledger underscores its growing reputation as a trusted platform for institutional-grade financial applications with this development marking the first time a Middle Eastern government real estate authority has tokenized property title deeds on a public blockchain. On the other hand, the surge in XRP perpetual futures open interest to $9.68 billion reflects a powerful upward price trend, growing institutional and retail leverage, supportive technicals, improved legal outlook, and accelerating volume across venues. These elements combine to create the possiblity of new highs with XRP’s present price sitting at $3.27, a stone’s throw away from the all-time high (ATH) price of $3.40.

title: US House Gears Up for Pivotal Stablecoin Bill Vote, Crypto Regulation at a Crossroads
body: BitcoinWorld US House Gears Up for Pivotal Stablecoin Bill Vote, Crypto Regulation at a Crossroads The halls of the U.S. Capitol are abuzz with anticipation as the cryptocurrency world braces for a series of critical legislative developments. For anyone deeply invested in the future of digital assets, understanding these movements is paramount. Reports indicate that the US House is on the cusp of a significant vote, one that could profoundly shape the regulatory landscape for stablecoins and the broader crypto market. This isn’t just about technicalities; it’s about the very foundation upon which the next era of finance will be built. Decoding the GENIUS Stablecoin Bill: A Game Changer? On July 18, the spotlight will be firmly on a rule vote for the GENIUS stablecoin bill. This legislative effort aims to establish a comprehensive framework for stablecoins, which are digital assets designed to maintain a stable value relative to a fiat currency like the U.S. dollar. The significance of this stablecoin bill cannot be overstated. Currently, stablecoins operate in a regulatory gray area, leading to uncertainty for issuers, users, and traditional financial institutions looking to engage with them. What could the GENIUS bill entail? While specifics often evolve, such legislation typically seeks to address several key areas: Reserve Requirements: Mandating that stablecoin issuers hold reserves (e.g., cash, short-term U.S. Treasuries) equivalent to the value of the stablecoins they issue, ensuring 1:1 backing. This aims to prevent the kind of collapses seen with algorithmic stablecoins that lacked proper collateral. Auditing and Transparency: Requiring regular, independent audits of reserve holdings and transparent reporting to regulators and the public. This builds trust and accountability. Licensing and Supervision: Establishing a clear licensing regime for stablecoin issuers, potentially under federal or state banking authorities, to ensure they meet capital, liquidity, and operational standards. Redemption Rights: Guaranteeing users the right to redeem their stablecoins for the underlying fiat currency at par value, reinforcing their stability. The potential benefits of a clear stablecoin framework are numerous. It could foster greater institutional adoption, provide regulatory certainty for businesses, and enhance consumer protection. However, challenges exist, including striking the right balance between robust oversight and fostering innovation, and avoiding an overly burdensome regulatory regime that could push development offshore. Navigating the CLARITY Market Structure Bill: What’s Next for Crypto Regulation? Following the stablecoin vote, attention is expected to shift to the CLARITY market structure bill , though its vote may be postponed until next week. This bill is arguably even more ambitious, seeking to define how the broader crypto market operates, including exchanges, brokers, and the classification of digital assets themselves. The lack of a clear market structure framework has been a persistent pain point for the crypto industry in the U.S., leading to regulatory uncertainty and enforcement actions by agencies like the SEC and CFTC. A comprehensive market structure bill would likely tackle: Jurisdiction: Clarifying whether digital assets fall under the purview of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) as securities or the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) as commodities. This has been a central point of contention and legal battles. Token Classification: Establishing clear criteria for distinguishing between different types of digital assets (e.g., utility tokens, security tokens, payment tokens) and assigning appropriate regulatory oversight. Exchange Registration: Creating a pathway for crypto exchanges to register and operate legally, providing clear rules for trading, custody, and order execution. Investor Protection: Implementing measures to protect investors from fraud, manipulation, and other illicit activities within the crypto market. The successful passage of a market structure bill could provide much-needed regulatory certainty, allowing crypto businesses to innovate and grow within a defined legal framework. It could also enhance investor confidence and bring the U.S. closer to other jurisdictions that have established clearer rules, such as the EU’s MiCA (Markets in Crypto-Assets) regulation. The delay, while potentially frustrating, underscores the complexity and the intense debate surrounding these critical definitions. The Anti-CBDC Stance: A Defense Against Digital Control? Beyond the immediate legislative focus on stablecoins and market structure, another significant development is brewing: the expected inclusion of anti-CBDC provisions in the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA). A Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) is a digital form of a country’s fiat currency, issued and backed by its central bank. While proponents argue CBDCs could enhance financial inclusion, efficiency, and monetary policy tools, critics voice strong concerns. The inclusion of anti-CBDC language in the NDAA, a defense spending bill, highlights the national security implications perceived by some lawmakers. Concerns often revolve around: Privacy: Fears that a government-controlled digital currency could allow for unprecedented surveillance of citizens’ financial transactions, eroding privacy rights. Government Control: Worries that a CBDC could give the government too much power over individuals’ spending, potentially allowing for programmatic control or even expiration dates on funds. Disintermediation of Banks: The potential for CBDCs to bypass commercial banks, altering the traditional financial system structure. National Security: Arguments that a CBDC could be vulnerable to cyberattacks or be used for geopolitical influence by adversaries if not properly secured. This move reflects a growing sentiment among a bipartisan group of lawmakers who are wary of a U.S. CBDC, prioritizing individual liberty and privacy over potential efficiencies. Its inclusion in a must-pass bill like the NDAA signals the strength of this opposition and could effectively block or significantly delay any efforts to implement a U.S. CBDC in the near future. The Broader Impact of Crypto Regulation on Innovation and Adoption These legislative efforts represent a pivotal moment for crypto regulation in the United States. The outcomes of these votes and the eventual shape of these bills will have far-reaching implications for: Innovation: Will clear rules foster a more robust environment for blockchain startups, or will overly restrictive regulations stifle growth and push talent overseas? Consumer Protection: How effectively will these frameworks shield everyday investors from scams and market volatility while allowing them access to new financial opportunities? Financial Stability: How will stablecoins and digital assets integrate into the existing financial system without introducing systemic risks? Global Competitiveness: Will the U.S. maintain its leadership in financial innovation, or will other nations with clearer regulatory frameworks pull ahead? The debate surrounding these bills is intense, with various stakeholders — from established financial institutions to grassroots crypto enthusiasts — lobbying for their interests. Lawmakers are grappling with the complex task of understanding nascent technology while crafting legislation that is both effective and future-proof. What Does This Mean for You? Actionable Insights As these legislative dramas unfold, what should the average crypto holder or enthusiast be doing? Stay Informed: Follow reputable crypto news sources and legislative updates. Eleanor Terrett’s reports, for instance, offer valuable insights into the congressional pulse. Understanding the nuances of these bills is crucial. Engage with Lawmakers: If you feel strongly about specific aspects of these bills, consider contacting your representatives. Advocacy groups like the Blockchain Association or Coin Center provide resources for effective engagement. Assess Your Portfolio: While direct impacts are speculative until bills pass, understanding the potential regulatory shifts can help you anticipate market reactions, especially concerning stablecoins and specific tokens. Understand Risks: Even with clearer regulation, the crypto market remains volatile. Do your due diligence and invest responsibly. The legislative process is often slow and arduous, but these upcoming votes signal a heightened focus on digital assets. The very fact that these bills are reaching the floor of the House indicates a growing recognition among policymakers of crypto’s permanence and importance. The Road Ahead: Challenges and Opportunities The path to comprehensive crypto regulation in the U.S. is fraught with challenges. Bipartisan agreement is often elusive, and the technical complexities of blockchain technology can be difficult for non-experts to grasp. Jurisdictional squabbles between agencies like the SEC and CFTC further complicate matters. However, the opportunity for the U.S. to solidify its position as a leader in financial innovation, while safeguarding consumers and maintaining financial stability, is immense. These votes are not the end, but rather significant milestones in an ongoing journey. The outcomes will set precedents and influence future legislative efforts. The crypto community must remain vigilant, engaged, and ready to adapt to an evolving regulatory landscape. In conclusion, the upcoming U.S. House votes on the GENIUS stablecoin bill and the CLARITY market structure bill, coupled with the anti-CBDC provisions in the NDAA, represent a pivotal moment for the digital asset space. These legislative actions underscore the increasing mainstream recognition of cryptocurrencies and the urgent need for regulatory clarity. While the immediate future holds uncertainty, the long-term goal remains a robust, secure, and innovative crypto ecosystem within the United States. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends and the evolving landscape of digital asset regulation, explore our articles on key developments shaping the future of crypto in the U.S. and globally. This post US House Gears Up for Pivotal Stablecoin Bill Vote, Crypto Regulation at a Crossroads first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: SEC delays in-kind redemption decision for Bitwise crypto ETFs
body: The US SEC has extended its decision deadline on whether to allow in-kind redemptions for Bitwise’s spot Bitcoin and Ether ETFs on NYSE Arca.

title: Strategy Hits $128.5B Valuation with 601,550 BTC
body: The post Strategy Hits $128.5B Valuation with 601,550 BTC appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Crypto market sentiment remains strong as Bitcoin trades near $118,000, backed by growing institutional interest and continued ETF inflows. Capital is rotating into altcoins, and confidence is rising across the board. In this wave of bullish momentum, companies like Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy) are stealing the spotlight for their aggressive Bitcoin adoption. Now, Strategy has secured a place among the t op 100 U.S. public companies , signaling how deeply Bitcoin has penetrated traditional finance. Strategy is accumulating Bitcoin since 2020, while back then many rejected their idea as a gamble, in 2025, it is a live example of building a billion-dollar empire by just adding small BTC constantly. They made every dip count. Strategy Climbs to Top 100 with $128.5 Billion Valuation Strategy’s market cap has hit a record $128.5 billion, placing it among America’s 84th-largest public companies. Just five years ago, it was worth under $2 billion. This dramatic growth is driven by Executive Chairman Michael Saylor’s Bitcoin-centric playbook, turning the firm from a legacy software business into the largest corporate BTC holder. The company now holds 601,550 BTC, worth over $70 billion, making it a de facto Bitcoin ETF for equity investors. Its stock currently trades at $455.90, roughly 15% below its all-time high, but remains a favorite for investors betting on Bitcoin’s long-term upside. Bold Fundraising and Share Expansion Strategy’s transformation has been fueled by massive capital raises and share expansion. Since 2020, its share count has nearly tripled to 281.9 million through ATM offerings, a 10-for-1 stock split in 2024, and stock-based compensation. In late 2024, Strategy unveiled a $42 billion capital-raising plan, following a $21 billion raise the prior quarter. These funds have been funneled almost entirely into Bitcoin acquisitions. The company now acts as a leveraged Bitcoin proxy, with diluted shares outstanding estimated at 315.1 million, reflecting future conversions from debt and options. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Why Bitcoin Could Still Climb to $147,000 Before Major Selling Begins , Analyst Sees Breakout Ahead Crypto analyst Sean Trades recently shared a positive outlook for Strategy’s stock (MSTR). title: Call of Duty at its most unpopular levels ahead of Black Ops 7 reveal
body: The “gold standard” of first-person shooter games Call of Duty is reportedly struggling to keep players in-game ahead of the global reveal of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 , scheduled for August 19 at Gamescom’s Opening Night Live event. After decades of counting millions of user numbers, recent figures suggest the franchise is losing a chunk of its audience. According to data from SteamCharts dated July 17, just 27,900 users were playing Call of Duty on Steam, with a 24-hour peak of 66,798 players. The figure is a whopping 86% decrease from its all-time peak, recorded at 488,897. Are FPS gamers still spending time on COD? In 2020, several gaming publications reported that players spent over 25 billion hours in the franchise, roughly 2.85 million years of gameplay. The claim recently went viral again on social media, but the gaming community has since questioned its accuracy. Gamers have logged more than 25 billion hours, equivalent to 2.85 million years, playing Call of Duty—surpassing the entire timeline of human history. pic.twitter.com/erFUGBZRP1 — Historic Vids (@historyinmemes) July 15, 2025 “How would they have gotten that number if the Xbox isn’t connected to the Internet?” one Reddit user asked, asking about how statistics like offline play could be reliably tracked. “I actually did a little bit more digging and found an even older article from 9 years ago claiming the same figures for hours. But again, all of these numbers are still questionable without any proper evidence. These numbers could have very well been pulled out of their ass,” another Redditor remarked. Call of Duty player numbers on Steam. Source: Steam Charts The latest IP release from Activision, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 , was added to Microsoft’s Xbox Game Pass to purportedly boost the subscription platform. Yet, according to data from analytics firm Ampere shared with The Game Business , Black Ops 6 generated just a 2% increase in Game Pass subscriptions post-launch. In November 2024, shortly after the game’s debut, player numbers went up to 33.7 million from 2023’s 20.7 million. Gamers believed part of the surge was a result of dissatisfaction with 2023’s Modern Warfare 3 , bashed for reusing content and a short, forgettable campaign experience, dubbed as a “ Modern Warfare 2 DLC .” By March 2025, Ampere found that the total player count had declined to 20.6 million. The same month in 2024 had seen 20.8 million players, and March 2023 reported 22.4 million. Between July 10 and July 17, 2025, player numbers fluctuated between approximately 25,000 and 66,000 active users at peak hours. These numbers fall significantly short of the franchise’s highs and show how much loyalists have become somewhat apathetic to the game. Community frustrated over hacking, loot, and unnecessary promos The frustration among the active community members on Activision’s content and gameplay updates has only gone up since Microsoft acquired the game publisher in 2022. “This game is so dogshit. Movement is bad. Audio is bad. Meta is bad. Anticheat is bad. Bundles are bad. Lmaoooo,” wrote one disgruntled gamer on X. Complaints from the community include poor anti-cheat implementation, unbalanced gameplay mechanics, and a lack of meaningful content updates. Not many players have had positive things to say about COD, and even the season 4 Beavis and Butthead event, was profoundly lambasted. “Can’t wait to NOT play this! Seriously if you showed this screenshot to me back on mw2019 (not that long ago) I would’ve thought you were on crack. But still every cod influencer is going to buy it up and keep degrading the standard,” complained one X user. Activeplayer estimates show that Call of Duty: Warzone , the free-to-play battle royale spinoff, still attracts between 1 to 3 million daily active users, with monthly figures consolidating around 30 to 50 million. title: Bitcoin Mining: French Lawmakers Propose Groundbreaking Nuclear Energy Bill
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Mining: French Lawmakers Propose Groundbreaking Nuclear Energy Bill Imagine a world where the energy needed to power the global Bitcoin network comes from clean, abundant sources, not from burning fossil fuels. This isn’t just a distant dream; it is becoming a tangible possibility, particularly in France. Recent developments indicate a significant shift in perspective, as French lawmakers have introduced a pioneering bill aimed at harnessing the nation’s often-debated surplus nuclear power for Bitcoin mining . This innovative proposal seeks to transform a perceived energy excess into a substantial economic asset, potentially generating up to $150 million in annual revenue. This initiative could mark a pivotal moment for the cryptocurrency industry, offering a blueprint for more sustainable and economically beneficial crypto mining operations worldwide. French Lawmakers’ Vision: A New Era for Bitcoin Mining? The core of the proposed legislation, as reported by CryptoSlate, centers on a five-year pilot program designed to strategically utilize France’s abundant, and at times, surplus nuclear energy for energy-intensive Bitcoin operations. This move by French lawmakers is not merely an opportunistic venture; it represents a thoughtful approach to leveraging existing infrastructure while addressing the energy consumption concerns often associated with cryptocurrencies. France, with its robust nuclear fleet, frequently produces more electricity than it consumes, especially during off-peak hours. This surplus energy, which might otherwise be curtailed or sold at low prices, could now find a highly profitable application. The potential economic benefits are significant. With an estimated annual revenue generation of $150 million, this pilot program could provide a substantial boost to the French economy. Beyond direct revenue, it could foster job creation in the digital infrastructure sector, attract further investment in clean energy technologies, and position France as a leader in sustainable blockchain innovation. It is a strategic move that aligns economic growth with environmental responsibility. The Power of Nuclear Energy in Crypto Mining Why nuclear energy ? The answer lies in its unique characteristics. Unlike intermittent renewable sources like solar or wind, nuclear power provides a stable, baseload supply of electricity 24/7. This consistency is highly desirable for Bitcoin mining , which requires a continuous and reliable power source to maintain profitability. Furthermore, nuclear energy is a low-carbon source, producing virtually no greenhouse gas emissions during operation, which directly addresses one of the most significant criticisms leveled against Bitcoin’s environmental footprint. The concept of using ‘surplus’ energy is crucial here. France’s nuclear power plants operate most efficiently when running at full capacity. However, demand fluctuates. When demand is low, the excess power can be challenging to manage. Instead of curtailing production or exporting cheap electricity, directing this surplus to energy-intensive activities like crypto mining presents an elegant solution. It transforms a potential liability into an asset, optimizing grid stability and energy utilization. This approach contrasts sharply with traditional fossil fuel-based mining operations, offering a pathway towards truly sustainable digital asset creation. Is Sustainable Crypto Mining Finally Within Reach? The global conversation around Bitcoin’s energy consumption has often been heated, with critics pointing to its carbon footprint. However, initiatives like the one proposed by French lawmakers offer a compelling counter-narrative. By intentionally seeking out and utilizing clean, often wasted, energy sources, the industry can significantly mitigate its environmental impact. This isn’t just about reducing emissions; it’s about pioneering a model where digital innovation and environmental stewardship go hand-in-hand. The potential for renewable energy sources to power the crypto industry is immense. While solar and wind are critical components of a green energy future, their intermittency can be a challenge for constant operations like mining. Nuclear power, with its consistent output, complements these renewables by providing a stable foundation. This integrated approach, where various clean energy sources are strategically deployed, could pave the way for a future where crypto mining is predominantly powered by sustainable means, shifting the narrative from energy drain to energy innovation. Key Aspects of Sustainable Mining: Energy Source Diversification: Utilizing a mix of nuclear, hydro, solar, and wind. Load Balancing: Using mining as a flexible load to stabilize grids. Waste Heat Utilization: Exploring ways to repurpose heat generated by mining operations. Policy & Regulation: Governments encouraging green mining practices through incentives. Economic Opportunities and Challenges for Crypto Mining in France The proposed bill presents a wealth of economic opportunities for France. Beyond the direct revenue from Bitcoin mining , the initiative could stimulate significant technological advancements within the country. It could attract global crypto companies looking for stable, green energy solutions, leading to foreign investment and the development of specialized expertise in high-performance computing and energy management. Furthermore, the pilot program could serve as a model for other nations with similar energy profiles, fostering international collaboration in sustainable digital infrastructure. However, no ambitious project is without its challenges. Public perception of crypto mining , often associated with high energy use, will need careful management. Clear communication about the use of surplus and renewable energy will be vital to gain public support. Regulatory hurdles, including ensuring compliance with existing energy and financial laws, will also need to be navigated. Technical implementation, such as integrating mining facilities with existing nuclear grid infrastructure, will require meticulous planning and execution. Additionally, the volatile nature of Bitcoin’s price could impact the profitability projections, necessitating a flexible and adaptable framework. Potential Benefits: Revenue Generation: Up to $150 million annually. Grid Optimization: Efficient use of surplus nuclear power. Technological Leadership: Positioning France as an innovator in sustainable crypto. Job Creation: Growth in tech and energy sectors. Potential Challenges: Public Perception: Overcoming negative stereotypes about crypto energy use. Regulatory Framework: Developing robust and adaptable policies. Technical Integration: Ensuring seamless operation with energy grids. Market Volatility: Managing revenue fluctuations due to Bitcoin price swings. A Bold Step Towards a Sustainable Digital Future The proposal by French lawmakers to leverage surplus nuclear energy for Bitcoin mining is more than just an economic venture; it’s a statement about the future of digital assets and energy. It signifies a growing recognition that cryptocurrencies, when powered responsibly, can be part of a sustainable energy ecosystem rather than a drain on resources. This pilot program, if successful, could provide a powerful template for other nations, demonstrating how innovation, economic opportunity, and environmental responsibility can converge. As the world grapples with energy transitions and the increasing demand for digital infrastructure, France’s bold move could illuminate a path towards a truly green and prosperous future for crypto mining . To learn more about the latest Bitcoin mining trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin’s institutional adoption. This post Bitcoin Mining: French Lawmakers Propose Groundbreaking Nuclear Energy Bill first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: ChangeNOW Redefines Crypto Speed Standards with Sub-2-Minute Swaps
body: The crypto exchange platform ChangeNOW has reached a new performance milestone, officially announcing an average cryptocurrency processing time of under two minutes, with a median of four minutes, placing it at the forefront of transaction speed and user experience among non-custodial services in Web3. As Web3 platforms mature, crypto transfer times have become a decisive factor in user behavior, not just in theory, but in measurable preference. A 2024 survey of South Korean crypto investors found that 26.8% ranked deposit and withdrawal speed as the most important factor when choosing an exchange, ahead of both liquidity and reputation. Crypto users seek fast transactions Meanwhile, Binance’s 2024 Global User Survey, based on responses from over 27,000 participants, reported that 17.2% cited transaction speed and ease as a key reason for entering crypto in the first place. Transaction speed is no longer a bonus, it’s a baseline. Most exchanges still lag far behind. “ Two years ago, 10-minute swaps were the norm. Today, we’re consistently delivering under two, ” said Pauline Shangett, Chief Strategy Officer at ChangeNOW. “ That’s not just fast for Web3, it’s on par with the fastest crypto transfer solutions in fintech. ” The platform’s performance was independently validated in the July 2025 Swapzone Industry Report , which benchmarks real-time swap speeds across leading instant-exchange platforms. According to the report, the current industry median is 9-10 minutes, placing ChangeNOW among the top performers in the non-custodial segment. ChangeNow strives for low latency as industry standard “ Speed has become mission-critical, ” Shangett added. “ As real-world use cases scale and institutions demand fintech-grade UX from decentralized platforms, we anticipate sub-minute swaps becoming the industry standard by 2026. Latency will no longer be tolerated, especially in cross-chain and payment-focused applications. We’re building infrastructure that meets that bar today, not years from now. ” ChangeNow is carrying over $54M in daily volumes, focusing on swaps for top crypto coins and stablecoins. The market also operates as a crypto management platform, offering access for retail Web3 users. The exchange has evolved since 2017, growing its reach to 5M users worldwide. Over the years, ChangeNow moved on from simple swaps to add Web3 services, custodial storage, trading, and staking.

title: President Trump could blow up America's credibility and markets by firing Powell
body: If Trump actually fires Powell, expect chaos. That’s the blunt warning from Wall Street analysts, legal professionals, and even some people close to the White House. A new research note from Wolfe Research lays it out clearly: “This would be a mess.” Markets will crash, yields will spike, and the U.S. will lose credibility overnight. There’s no elegant way to spin it; kicking Powell out before his term ends would light a match under the whole economy. On Wednesday morning, things looked shaky for the Fed Chair after a senior White House official told CNBC that Trump told Republican lawmakers at dinner the night before that he’d likely fire Powell “soon.” That was the plan. But by the afternoon, Trump pulled a 180 in front of reporters. “We’re not planning on doing it,” he said . Then, as usual, he left the door wide open: “I don’t rule out anything… but I think it’s highly unlikely, unless he has to leave for fraud.” Analysts say markets would tank and lawsuits would follow Wolfe Research’s Tobin Marcus and Chutong Zhu said the firing would almost certainly trigger an equity selloff and push long-term bond yields up sharply. Why? Because it’d signal that the Fed isn’t independent anymore, and investors hate that. The legal fight would be immediate. If Trump tried to force Powell out, the Fed Chair would likely sue. Wolfe Research said as much: “If Trump moves to actually fire Powell rather than just pressure him to resign, Powell would presumably sue to stop it.” They also raised the possibility that Powell might be temporarily sidelined during the court fight. In other words, even if he ends up winning, the markets would still have to operate without a Fed Chair for months. This wouldn’t be Trump’s first battle against the heads of independent agencies. Wolfe pointed out that during Trump’s second-term firings, multiple agency commissioners sued after being removed. None of them won. But here’s the thing: Powell isn’t just a commissioner. He’s the head of the most powerful central bank on earth, a whole different level of power. That is definitely enough to change the legal playing field. Critics warn that credibility and inflation control would collapse Roger Altman, Evercore founder and former deputy Treasury secretary under Clinton, didn’t mince words. He called the idea of firing Powell “dreadful.” Speaking on CNBC, Altman said, “There are a lot of bad ideas out there. But the president firing the chairman of the Fed… that’s among the worst ideas.” His reasoning is simple: independent central banks work, political ones don’t. He pointed to Turkey and Argentina, where leaders control the central banks and inflation is out of control. Roger also doubted that Powell would willingly step down. “I don’t think Chairman Powell would accede to a request that he leave,” he said. That means the legal path is probably unavoidable — and likely messy. Even Jim Cramer jumped in. After watching markets move on the firing rumors, he said , “I hope today is the last day that Trump goes after Jay Powell.” He added, “Gunning for Powell will only hurt Trump, the same way it hurts the markets.” Jim pointed out that Powell’s term ends in ten months, so really Trump could just wait. Markets were rattled. The Dow finished up 0.53%, the S&P gained 0.32%, and the Nasdaq rose 0.26%. But don’t let the green fool you, there was serious concern all day that Trump might actually pull the trigger this time. Jim summed it up like this: “What’s in it for President Trump if he tries to fire Powell? I think we saw it today: nothing. The stock market would get rocked. Long-term interest rates would rise. What president would want that to happen?” Your crypto news deserves attention - KEY Difference Wire puts you on 250+ top sites

title: U.S. Marshals Hold 28,988 BTC—Far Less Than Thought, Records Show
body: The U.S. Marshals Service currently holds 28,988 BTC, a figure significantly lower than previously reported by various sources. This information was made public following a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) request filed by journalist L0la L33tz, working on assignment for Bitcoin Magazine chairman David Bailey. Bailey had offered a $10,000 bounty for independently confirming the U.S. government’s Bitcoin holdings. L0la L33tz explained the distinction between seized and forfeited assets, emphasizing that the U.S. Marshals Service is responsible specifically for coins that have been seized and subsequently forfeited—meaning they have been designated as government property by a court order. Only these assets can be lawfully sold by the government. She noted that popular on-chain data trackers often overestimate the government’s holdings, as they sometimes include assets that have only been seized but not yet legally forfeited. These coins may be under the control of agencies like the FBI, but they remain unsellable until a court’s forfeiture decision is issued. As an example, L0la L33tz cited the 94,000 BTC linked to the Bitfinex exchange hack. Though some trackers attribute these funds to the U.S. government, a judicial forfeiture decision has not yet been reached in the case. As a result, concerns about imminent government sales of these coins are premature. The Marshals Service typically sells forfeited cryptocurrencies through public auctions. While there are currently no announced sales planned, all 28,988 BTC remain on the agency’s books. Arkham, a blockchain analytics firm, had previously identified U.S. government-controlled wallets holding approximately $23.5 billion worth of Bitcoin. The news drew criticism from some proponents of holding Bitcoin as a strategic reserve. Senator Cynthia Lummis, for example, called the current situation a “strategic mistake.” “I’m alarmed by reports that the U.S. has sold off over 80% of its Bitcoin reserves—leaving just ~29,000 coins,” she commented.

title: Infini Exploiter’s Shocking $10 Million Profit from ETH Sale
body: BitcoinWorld Infini Exploiter’s Shocking $10 Million Profit from ETH Sale The world of decentralized finance (DeFi) is often a high-stakes arena, where innovation meets audacious challenges. Today, the spotlight falls squarely on the Infini exploiter , the individual or group behind the significant security breach of the crypto credit card provider Infini. In a move that underscores the lucrative, albeit illicit, side of digital assets, this exploiter has just executed a massive ETH sale , converting a substantial portion of their ill-gotten gains into a stable asset. This transaction, involving 1,770 ETH exchanged for a staggering 5.88 million DAI, has sent ripples through the on-chain monitoring community, highlighting both the agility of sophisticated attackers and the persistent challenges in blockchain security . The Audacious Infini Exploiter: Unpacking the Initial Crypto Hack Let’s rewind a bit to understand the full scope of this story. On February 24, the crypto ecosystem witnessed a significant event when the Infini platform was targeted in a major crypto hack . The attacker successfully siphoned off an astonishing $49.5 million in digital assets. What followed was a strategic move by the exploiter, who promptly converted these stolen funds into 17,696 ETH, acquired at an average price of $2,798 per ETH. This initial acquisition was a clear bet on Ethereum’s future price trajectory, a gamble that has evidently paid off handsomely. The decision to hold ETH, rather than immediately liquidate, demonstrates a calculated approach, leveraging market dynamics to amplify their illicit gains. On-chain analytics platforms, like Lookonchain, play a crucial role in tracking such movements. Their vigilant monitoring provides transparency in a space where anonymity often reigns. It was through their diligent tracking that the recent significant transaction came to light, allowing the crypto community to observe the exploiter’s next steps in near real-time. Decoding the ETH Sale: Why the Shift to DAI Stablecoin? The latest development sees the Infini exploiter offloading 1,770 ETH for 5.88 million DAI stablecoin . This strategic pivot from a volatile asset like Ethereum to a stablecoin like DAI is particularly noteworthy. Why would an exploiter make such a move? Profit Realization: The most immediate reason is to lock in profits. With ETH’s price appreciating since the initial acquisition, the exploiter was sitting on a significant unrealized profit, now estimated to be over $10 million. Selling ETH for DAI allows them to crystallize these gains, protecting them from any subsequent market downturns. Stability and Liquidity: DAI is a decentralized stablecoin pegged to the US dollar. By converting ETH to DAI, the exploiter effectively stabilizes the value of their holdings. This provides a secure base for future operations, whether it’s further obfuscation of funds, moving to other chains, or preparing for eventual off-ramping into fiat currency. Reduced Volatility Risk: Holding large amounts of ETH exposes one to market volatility. While it offered significant upside, it also carried the risk of price corrections. Shifting to DAI eliminates this risk, ensuring the value of the stolen funds remains constant in dollar terms. This transaction underscores the sophisticated financial maneuvers often employed by those involved in large-scale crypto exploits. It’s not just about stealing funds; it’s about managing them strategically to maximize returns and minimize risks. Strengthening Blockchain Security: Lessons from the Infini Incident The Infini crypto hack and the subsequent activities of the Infini exploiter serve as a stark reminder of the ongoing challenges within blockchain security . While blockchain technology offers unprecedented transparency and immutability, the applications built on top of it, particularly in the DeFi space, remain vulnerable to sophisticated attacks. The incident highlights several critical areas for improvement: Robust Audits: Comprehensive and continuous security audits of smart contracts are paramount. Many exploits stem from vulnerabilities in code that could be identified through rigorous testing. Decentralized Security Measures: Implementing multi-layered security protocols, including bug bounty programs and white-hat hacker incentives, can help identify and patch vulnerabilities before they are exploited. Community Vigilance: The role of on-chain analytics platforms and the broader crypto community in tracking suspicious activities is invaluable. Prompt identification and reporting can sometimes limit the damage or aid in tracing funds. User Education: Users must be educated about the risks associated with interacting with new or unaudited DeFi protocols. Every exploit, while detrimental, provides valuable lessons for the ecosystem to learn and adapt. The goal is to build more resilient and secure platforms that can withstand increasingly sophisticated attacks, thereby fostering greater trust and adoption. What’s Next for the Infini Exploiter and the Crypto Community? With the ETH sale completed, the Infini exploiter is now sitting on a substantial sum of DAI stablecoin , making their next move a subject of keen interest for those tracking illicit funds. Will they attempt to bridge these funds to other chains, utilize privacy protocols, or seek to off-ramp them into traditional financial systems? These are the questions that law enforcement agencies and blockchain forensics firms will be working to answer. For the broader crypto community, this event serves as a powerful reminder of the importance of vigilance and continuous improvement in blockchain security . As the DeFi landscape continues to evolve, so too must the defenses against those who seek to exploit its nascent vulnerabilities. The pursuit of a truly secure and decentralized financial future requires constant innovation, collaboration, and an unwavering commitment to protecting user assets. title: Father of Crypto Tycoon Vanishes As $1,000,000+ Drained from His Bank Accounts: Report
body: The father of a successful crypto investor is missing, and his family is worried he may have been kidnapped. Wen Hou, the chief investment officer of the private investment firm Coincident Capital, believes the disappearance of his father, Naiping Hou, could be tied to his crypto wealth. The younger Hou tells ABC7 Eyewitness News that he hasn’t seen his 74-year-old father since they went on a fishing trip in March. Authorities believe the elder Hou was abducted that month, according to the news outlet. Wen says he exchanged text messages with his father’s phone, but now believes the person he was texting wasn’t Naiping. Wen says Naiping, a resident of Rancho Cucamonga, California, previously would never pass up an opportunity to see his grandkids. “I have really young children, and we frequently ask him if he wants to come and visit us… He would refuse now… saying, ‘I’m tired,’ or ‘I can’t meet,’ or ‘I’ll call you later.'” Some of Wen’s family friends then went to check on Naiping’s house, but when they arrived, the home was empty. Wen says they later realized more than $1 million had been stolen from his father’s bank accounts. “Money was being wired out to buy gold online. He’s not an online-savvy person, so I don’t know how he’s able to buy gold online.” The San Bernardino County Sheriff’s Department is looking into the matter, and Wen says his family is offering a $250,000 reward for critical info that could lead to a breakthrough in the case. title: Wintermute’s Pivotal Revelation: Ethereum (ETH) Supply Exhausted on OTC Desk
body: BitcoinWorld Wintermute’s Pivotal Revelation: Ethereum (ETH) Supply Exhausted on OTC Desk Are you following the pulse of the cryptocurrency market? If so, a recent announcement from Evgeny Gaevoy, the CEO of leading crypto market maker Wintermute , has likely caught your attention. In a significant disclosure on X, Gaevoy revealed that the firm’s over-the-counter (OTC) desk has almost no Ethereum (ETH) remaining for sale. This isn’t just a fleeting headline; it’s a profound indicator of shifting dynamics within the digital asset space, particularly concerning OTC Trading and overall Digital Asset Liquidity . What Does Wintermute ‘s ETH Revelation Truly Signify? When a major player like Wintermute , renowned for its extensive operations in providing liquidity across various digital assets, states it has virtually no Ethereum left on its OTC desk, it speaks volumes. This isn’t about retail exchanges running out of ETH; it’s about a specialized desk that facilitates large, institutional-grade transactions. For an OTC desk, a depleted supply of a major asset like ETH suggests several critical points: Overwhelming Demand: The primary implication is an exceptionally high demand for Ethereum from institutional clients, high-net-worth individuals, and other large-scale buyers who prefer to execute trades away from public order books to minimize price impact. Liquidity Crunch for Large Orders: It indicates that even major market makers are finding it challenging to source sufficient ETH to meet the demand for large block trades, which are the bread and butter of OTC desks. Market Efficiency: It hints at the efficiency of arbitrageurs and other market participants quickly absorbing any available supply, making it difficult for desks to maintain inventory. This situation paints a vivid picture of the current appetite for Ethereum , extending beyond typical retail interest into the deeper pockets of the institutional world. It’s a testament to ETH’s growing utility and perceived value. The Crucial Role of a Crypto Market Maker like Wintermute To fully grasp the weight of Gaevoy’s statement, it’s essential to understand what a crypto market maker does. Firms like Wintermute are the backbone of market efficiency and stability. They operate by simultaneously quoting buy and sell prices for digital assets, thereby facilitating trades and ensuring there’s always a counterparty available. Their core functions include: Providing Liquidity: They ensure that assets can be bought and sold quickly without significant price fluctuations, especially for large orders. Bridging Bid-Ask Spreads: By constantly offering bids and asks, they narrow the gap between the highest price a buyer is willing to pay and the lowest price a seller is willing to accept, making trading more cost-effective. Risk Management: They manage inventory risk and price volatility, often employing sophisticated algorithms and strategies. Wintermute ‘s success hinges on its ability to maintain robust inventory and access to deep liquidity pools. The fact that their Ethereum supply is dwindling suggests that even their sophisticated sourcing mechanisms are being tested by the sheer volume of buy requests. This isn’t just a business challenge for them; it’s a signal to the entire market about the prevailing sentiment around ETH. Navigating the World of OTC Trading : Why It Matters for Institutions OTC Trading , or Over-the-Counter trading, is a private way for large buyers and sellers to execute significant cryptocurrency trades directly with a market maker or another party, bypassing public exchanges. This method offers several distinct advantages, especially for institutions: Feature Public Exchange OTC Trading Transaction Size Typically smaller, fragmented orders Large block trades (e.g., millions of dollars) Price Impact High for large orders, can move market price Minimal or no price impact, fixed price agreed upon Privacy Trades visible on order books Private, off-exchange transactions Settlement Instantaneous through exchange Direct, bilateral settlement, often T+0 or T+1 The appeal of OTC desks for institutions is clear: they can acquire or divest large amounts of cryptocurrency without causing market ripples or revealing their intentions. The scarcity of Ethereum on Wintermute’s OTC desk highlights that this preferred avenue for institutional accumulation is facing supply constraints, which could push large buyers to other channels or even influence their purchasing strategies. The State of Ethereum : Why Is Demand So High? The surging demand for Ethereum , as evidenced by Wintermute ‘s situation, isn’t accidental. Several factors contribute to ETH’s robust appeal: The Merge and Staking: The transition to Proof-of-Stake (PoS) with The Merge made ETH a yield-bearing asset, attracting stakers who lock up their ETH, reducing circulating supply. Deflationary Mechanism (EIP-1559): A portion of transaction fees on the Ethereum network is burned, permanently removing ETH from circulation. This deflationary pressure, especially during periods of high network activity, contributes to scarcity. Ecosystem Growth: Ethereum remains the dominant platform for decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, and a vast array of dApps. Its utility as the ‘gas’ for this ecosystem ensures continuous demand. Institutional Adoption: More institutions are recognizing Ethereum as a programmable asset and a key component of the future digital economy, leading to significant accumulation. Potential for Spot ETH ETFs: The prospect of a spot Ethereum Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF) in the U.S. is a major catalyst, signaling mainstream acceptance and potentially opening floodgates for new capital. These combined forces create a powerful narrative for Ethereum , driving its perceived value and, consequently, the intense demand seen by market makers like Wintermute . Implications for Digital Asset Liquidity and the Broader Market The near depletion of Ethereum on Wintermute ‘s OTC desk has significant implications for overall Digital Asset Liquidity . Liquidity is the ease with which an asset can be converted into cash without affecting its market price. When a major liquidity provider faces scarcity: Increased Volatility Risk: Less available supply for large orders on OTC desks could force institutions onto public exchanges, potentially leading to larger price swings for big trades. Higher Premiums: Buyers might have to pay higher premiums to acquire large blocks of ETH, as supply becomes tighter across all channels. Shift in Sourcing Strategies: Market makers might need to explore new avenues for sourcing Ethereum , such as more aggressive accumulation from public exchanges or direct deals with large holders. Reinforced Bullish Sentiment: The scarcity itself can act as a bullish signal, suggesting that strong hands are accumulating and holding ETH, reducing available supply for sale. This situation underscores the evolving nature of the crypto markets, where even the largest players can experience supply constraints for highly demanded assets. It highlights the importance of deep and diverse liquidity pools for the healthy functioning of the ecosystem. Actionable Insights for Investors and Market Participants What can you take away from Wintermute ‘s revealing announcement? Understand Scarcity Signals: Pay attention to signals from major market makers. Their inventory levels can be leading indicators of institutional demand and supply dynamics. Evaluate Your ETH Position: If you are an Ethereum holder, this news reinforces the strong demand narrative, potentially supporting long-term value. If you’re looking to acquire, understand that large block purchases might become more challenging or costly through traditional OTC channels. Monitor Institutional Flows: The increasing institutional appetite for ETH is a key trend. Keep an eye on reports of institutional allocations and product launches (like potential ETFs). Diversify Your Sourcing: For large buyers, explore multiple OTC desks and liquidity providers, as some may have varying inventory levels. Stay Informed on Network Fundamentals: Continue to monitor Ethereum ‘s network activity, staking trends, and burning rates, as these directly impact supply. The landscape of Digital Asset Liquidity is constantly shifting, and understanding the mechanisms behind it is crucial for informed decision-making. A Compelling Summary: The Future of Ethereum and Institutional Demand Evgeny Gaevoy’s statement regarding Wintermute ‘s near-depleted Ethereum supply on its OTC desk is more than just a news byte; it’s a powerful indicator of the intensifying institutional demand for ETH . As a prominent crypto market maker , Wintermute ‘s experience reflects a broader trend of diminishing available supply for large-scale purchases, highlighting the growing significance of Ethereum in institutional portfolios and the tightening of Digital Asset Liquidity for this asset. This situation underscores Ethereum ‘s robust fundamentals, including its deflationary mechanics, staking appeal, and thriving ecosystem. For market participants, it serves as a reminder to closely monitor supply-demand dynamics and institutional flows, as these will continue to shape the future price action and accessibility of leading digital assets. The message is clear: the big players are accumulating, and the available supply for major block trades is becoming increasingly scarce. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action. This post Wintermute’s Pivotal Revelation: Ethereum (ETH) Supply Exhausted on OTC Desk first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: The State of US Debt Refinancing in 2025: Can-Kicking, Short-Term Risk, and Crypto Market Implications
body: The State of US Debt Refinancing in 2025: Can-Kicking, Short-Term Risk, and Crypto Market Implications 1. Progress on US Debt Refinancing: How Much Is Done and What Remains As of mid-July 2025, the United States is navigating through one of the largest debt refinancing cycles in its history. For 2025, approximately $9.2 trillion in federal debt is due for refinancing—a figure that amounts to nearly a third of all outstanding US government debt and about 30% of GDP. Completed Refinancing (Jan–Jun 2025): Around $5 to $6.5 trillion of this year’s maturing debt has already been refinanced. This covers close to 55–70% of the total schedule, reflecting the typical front-loading strategy of Treasury auctions in the year's first half. Outstanding Refinancing (Jul–Dec 2025): An estimated $2.5 to $4 trillion remains to be rolled over by year-end. The Treasury will continue with regular auctions, but the bulk of the work—especially the spike in T-bill issuance—has set the tone for the remainder of the year. Year Total Due (USD Trillions) Already Refinanced Remaining 2025 9.2 5–6.5 2.5–4 2. The Short-Term T-Bill Strategy: Kicking the Can Down the Road Heavy Reliance on Short-Term Bills A defining feature of this refinancing round is the Treasury’s dependence on short-term Treasury bills (T-bills) —those maturing in one year or less. While the goal of extending average maturity persists, the majority of 2025's refinancing has been done via T-bills instead of longer-dated bonds. Estimated Share: About one-third of 2025 maturities originated as T-bills. Most new issuance has focused on instruments with maturities of 13, 26, or 52 weeks. Market Appeal: T-bills are attractive during uncertain or volatile times because they offer flexibility and are in high demand, but this has consequences. Risks: Larger Refinancing Wall in 2026 This tactic does not solve the long-term problem but simply delays it —a classic case of “kicking the can down the road.” By rolling over maturing debt with even more short-term debt, the Treasury ensures that 2026’s refinancing wall will also remain large , with about $7.6 trillion in debt coming due next year. The increased use of short-term maturities amplifies exposure to interest rate hikes. If interest rates rise, future rollovers will be at higher costs, straining the budget and potentially forcing difficult fiscal adjustments. Short-term refinancing creates frequent market risk events. Any disruption in Treasury markets—political standoffs, rate spikes, or liquidity crunches—could pose systemic risks to both the government and broader financial markets. 3. How Debt Refinancing Tactics May Impact the Crypto Market Macro Market Spillovers Volatility in Rates and Yields: Reliance on short-term debt makes Treasury yields more sensitive to policy shifts or market jitters. Sudden increases in government yields or failed auctions could spark capital flight from traditional assets, occasionally spilling over into higher demand for crypto as a hedge . Dollar Confidence and Alternatives: Aggressive short-termism raises questions about long-term fiscal stability and could negatively affect global confidence in the US dollar. Events that threaten “safe haven” status for Treasurys often lead some investors to diversify into non-sovereign assets— notably Bitcoin and major cryptocurrencies . Risk-On/Risk-Off Moves: In scenarios where government fiscal health deteriorates or there is fear of US debt volatility, crypto assets may see speculative inflows as alternative or “risk-on” stores of value. However, crypto markets may also be hit by liquidity shocks if a crisis in Treasurys sparks a broad risk-off move where investors scramble for cash. Potential Outcomes to Watch Sharp Rate Increases: Could fuel a crypto rally as investors flee future inflation and currency debasement fears. Treasury Market Stress: May initially cause volatility across all assets—including crypto—but could ultimately drive renewed interest in decentralized stores of value. Policy Uncertainty: Heavy-handed or unpredictable moves (e.g., abrupt Fed changes or rate policies) may heighten appeal for assets outside the traditional financial system. Conclusion The US approach to refinancing this year’s vast debt wall—by focusing on short-term T-bills—offers flexibility but perpetuates fiscal risk, leaving a larger challenge for 2026 and beyond. These decisions reverberate beyond the Treasury market, with potential to shake the confidence in traditional financial assets and spur activity in crypto markets as investors seek out alternative stores of value.

title: Solana Price Prediction: Can SOL Price Break the $200 Barrier This Month?
body: The post Solana Price Prediction: Can SOL Price Break the $200 Barrier This Month? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Solana (SOL) price is currently consolidating around the $175 mark, facing stiff resistance near the $185–190 level. Bullish chart patterns, including a symmetrical triangle breakout and golden cross, are fueling speculation of a move toward $200. But can SOL truly break past this critical resistance in July 2025? With a sharp rise in trading volume, ETF inflows, and Bitcoin’s ongoing rally, market sentiment is shifting. This article explores recent updates and technical indicators to assess whether a $200 breakout is achievable this month. Institutional Inflows Signal Growing Confidence in Solana Institutional interest in Solana surged notably in July 2025, marking a pivotal shift in how major investors view the blockchain. The launch of U.S.-based spot Solana ETFs, particularly the REX-Osprey Solana + Staking ETF (SSK), has attracted over $41 million in inflows within just days of its debut. Collectively, three newly launched Solana ETFs have accumulated nearly $78 million in assets under management, signaling strong early demand. Futures open interest on SOL has also climbed to over $7.5 billion, nearing historic highs—further reflecting heightened institutional engagement. Top asset managers such as Grayscale, VanEck, 21Shares, Bitwise, and Franklin Templeton have filed for Solana ETF products, and JPMorgan analysts project potential net inflows of $3–6 billion over the next year if approvals proceed. With the SEC streamlining ETF review processes, Solana is fast becoming a key institutional asset—not just a high-speed blockchain, but a vehicle for regulated capital allocation. Will Solana (SOL) Price Reach $200 This Month? Solana’s price has recently surged to around $175, reflecting a strong rebound from the $155–160 support zone. With Bitcoin reclaiming the $112,000 mark, risk-on sentiment is returning to the crypto market, benefiting high-beta assets like SOL. However, the $200 target remains a psychological and technical hurdle. The price is currently stuck within an ascending triangle and is attempting to break through the neckline, which also serves as a crucial resistance zone to overcome. The CMF has risen above 0, with the OBV maintaining an upward trend, which suggests a strengthening of the bulls’ position. Therefore, a breakout could further promote a potential move to $200, which may extend to $215. However, the short-term targets could vary between $185 and $190, and a rise above this range could validate the bullish spell for the Solana (SOL) price rally.

title: XRP Climbs to $3.20 as Hidden Breakout Signals Point to Bigger Moves Ahead
body: The post XRP Climbs to $3.20 as Hidden Breakout Signals Point to Bigger Moves Ahead appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ripple’s XRP is back in the spotlight, roaring past the $3 mark for the first time in years. While a few think this rally could cool off soon, many experts see the opposite. Old patterns are starting to show up again, and they hint that XRP might just be warming up for its next big jump. If you look closely, the clues for another breakout are hiding in plain sight. XRP Breakout Is Hidden in Plain Sight Ripple’s XRP is back in the spotlight, surging 10% in the last 24 hours to hit $3.20 and posting an impressive 33% gain over the past week. Meanwhile, the recent breakout wasn’t just another price pump. XRP shattered a long-term resistance trend that has been holding the token back for years. XRP is now consolidating in a smaller triangle pattern, a classic setup before another big move. If history repeats, this could pave the way for a sharp rally. Meanwhile, Versan Aljarrah, Co-founder of Black Swan Capitalist, says a hidden pattern is driving this rally. He points to an often-overlooked connection between XRP and the U.S. Dollar Index (DXY). According to him, every time the DXY falls sharply, XRP tends to shoot higher. XRP – Hidden in Plain Sight pic.twitter.com/BtQ5J4OSiW — Vandell | Black Swan Capitalist (@vandell33) July 16, 2025 Looking back, the same setup has appeared three times before, in 2018, 2021, and late 2024, each time sending XRP to multi-year highs. With the DXY now dropping again due to shifting economic policies, Aljarrah believes XRP could see another major jump if the dollar dips closer to levels last seen in 2018. Analysts See $6 or Higher Aljarrah isn’t alone in this bullish outlook. Well-known crypto analyst Ali Martinez predicts XRP could hit $6, while another expert, CasiTrades, highlights Fibonacci levels supporting a strong breakout. Meanwhile, optimism about a possible XRP ETF and the easing Ripple-SEC lawsuit has given the community more hope for price stability. Trading Volumes Hint at Strong Demand Adding fuel to the fire, XRP’s trading volume just jumped to $11.5 billion. Short sellers betting against the coin have lost big, with $360 million in shorts wiped out in the broader market, a sign that bulls are in control. Meanwhile, the daily chart shows a possible 38% upside if the momentum holds, putting XRP’s short-term target near $3.77. With liquidity stacked just above $3.40, many traders believe a breakout could trigger an explosive move higher.
